alert.note: Alert for Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 2:42PM MST until January 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...A prolonged period of snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Upper North Platte River Basin including Saratoga. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Saturday. A second wave of snow will be possible on Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
